hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Umar that he used to forbid silk and brocade except that which was like that, then he gestured with his finger, then his second finger, then his third, then his fourth,* and said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to forbid that to us.”

chapter.ara-name: باب لُبْسِ الْحَرِيرِ وَالدِّيبَاجِ فِي الْحَرْبِ
chapter.eng-name: Wearing silk and brocade in war
